name: silver-powder
effect: Held in battle : Holder’s bug-type moves have 1.2× their power.
short_effect: Held: Bug-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.black-white: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a shiny, silver powder that ups the power of Bug-type moves.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a shiny, silver powder that ups the power of Bug-type moves.
